**Likely Decline**

- none

**Active**

- **cmd/fix: remove all functionality** [#73605](https://go.dev/issue/73605)
  - skip
- **cmd/{go,cgo,compile}: change interpretation of relative //line directives** [#70478](https://go.dev/issue/70478)
  - commented
- **container/hash: Map, a generic hash table with custom hash function and equivalence relation** [#69559](https://go.dev/issue/69559)
  - commented
- **crypto/tls: dynamically reload root certificate authorities** [#64796](https://go.dev/issue/64796)
  - skip
- **crypto: ignore rand io.Reader where behavior is not specified** [#70942](https://go.dev/issue/70942)
  - commented
- **doc: mention "purego" build tag convention somewhere** [#23172](https://go.dev/issue/23172)
  - commented
- **encoding/{base32,base64}: constant-time implementations of RFC 4648 codecs for use with cryptography keys** [#73901](https://go.dev/issue/73901)
  - skip
- **maphash: drop purego version and establish stronger runtime boundary** [#74285](https://go.dev/issue/74285)
  - discussion ongoing
- **os: stop manually setting sticky bit on file creation on \*BSD, Solaris** [#68664](https://go.dev/issue/68664)
  - skip
- **runtime/mainthread: add mainthread.Do for mediating access to the main thread** [#70089](https://go.dev/issue/70089)
  - skip
- **syscall: add O\_OVERLAPPED on Windows** [#73676](https://go.dev/issue/73676)
  - commented
- **x/crypto/x509roots/fallback: export certificate bundle** [#69898](https://go.dev/issue/69898)
  - skip

  - put on hold

  - hold for @rsc
